I can't believe my sister is getting married on Christmas day.

translation.en: Yes, well, you don't go home anymore.

translation.en: Tell me one person who wants that.
translation.fr: Il n'y avait que ça pour que tu passes Noël ici. Qui tient à me voir ?

translation.en: Hello? Am I invisible?

translation.en: - Aw, you're so cute. - What?
- You missed me. - No! No! Whatever. No.
I did not. Don’t flatter yourself. No I didn't.
translation.fr: Pas du tout, rêve pas. Pas du tout.

translation.en: It's… It's just that I can’t go home.
translation.fr: C'est juste que chez moi, je peux pas.

translation.en: My father will be there, and all he ever does is talk about mom,
translation.fr: Mon père va être là. Tout ce qu'il fait, c'est parler de maman.

translation.en: and it makes him sad, Which makes everyone feel worse. So, yeah.

translation.en: Well, good thing is, you get to be my date.

translation.en: but I might be a bit late for the white wedding on Christmas Day.

The owners wouldn't ordinarily close down this place for a private function.

No. No. No.

Hey!
Aren’t I the most beautiful Zulu- Tswana bride you've ever seen?

Oh! Who could ever compare?

Wow! You're going have to pray a little harder next time.

Still looking like my future baby daddy.

translation.fr: Bon, je vais te donner mes Miles.

translation.en: - Sister, you don't have to do that. - Anything for you.
translation.fr: Arrête ! - Pas la peine. - Rien n'est trop beau pour toi.

translation.en: Hurry up and get dressed, we have to leave for the next fitting.
translation.fr: Va vite t'habiller. Il faut aller à l'autre essayage.

translation.en: You're getting married, man.
A new job overseas,  you've done really well for yourself.
translation.fr: Un boulot à l'étranger. Tu as assuré.

translation.en: Yeah! From engaged to getting married in three months.
translation.fr: Ouais ! Fiancés et mariés en trois mois !

translation.en: Yeah, but you don't think I'm rushing this?
- No. - No?
translation.fr: Je vais pas trop vite ? - Non. - Non ?

translation.en: - No. You-- - Yeah?
- You're fine. I mean unless you… - Yeah?
Did you get her pregnant?  Are you getting married because she's pregnant?
translation.fr: Elle est enceinte ? D'où le mariage ?

translation.en: Lydia will kill me if you had a kid first. You can't do that.
translation.fr: Lydia me tuera si vous avez un gosse avant nous.

translation.en: - Come on! - We’re far from babies.
translation.fr: - Fais pas ça ! - On n'est pas pressés.

translation.en: You see with the London job, we couldn't wait to get married.
translation.fr: Avec ce boulot à Londres, il fallait qu'on se marie.

translation.en: - Plus Beauty really liked this place. - It is really pretty.
translation.fr: Et Beauty craquait sur cet endroit.

translation.en: - Might as well. - Yeah, sharp.
translation.fr: Ouais, c'est super. Très chouette. Votre amour vous donne des ailes.

translation.en: I mean, your love will take you through anything.
translation.fr: Très chouette. Votre amour vous donne des ailes.

translation.en: You guys are okay.
Until like…
You even pray to God and say,
translation.fr: Tu en arrives à demander à Dieu :

translation.en: Take me, Lord. Take me first and throw me away.
translation.fr: Prends-moi, Seigneur. Prends-moi le premier, vas-y,

translation.en: I'm done.
Well, I just hope your best man speech is better than that, right?
translation.fr: J'espère que ton speech de témoin sera plus optimiste.

translation.en: - Yeah, no, I'm kidding. - Oh.
- I'm joking. - You're joking?
- Yeah. - You're joking?
Yeah. Marriage is great.
- I'm telling you. - Sure.
It's the best decision I've ever taken in my life.
translation.fr: C'est la plus belle décision de ma vie.

translation.en: - Sure? - Yeah.
Great! - Yeah. - Yeah.
- Sure? - Yeah.
- You look amazing! -  Fuck.
- You don't like it. - I love it.
It's so… breathtaking and stuff.
Also why do we need the three dresses?
translation.fr: Pourquoi il nous faut trois robes ?

translation.en: Because it's three ceremonies.
translation.fr: Il y a trois cérémonies. T'as pas suivi le groupe ?

translation.en: - Did you not read anything on the group? - I did. It's just…
translation.fr: Il y a trois cérémonies. T'as pas suivi le groupe ? Si, mais...

translation.en: in my mind,  I didn't think we'd be galivanting around Jo'burg for fittings.
translation.fr: je pensais pas qu'on allait cavaler pour des essayages.

translation.en: Well, Tumi, had you arrived earlier,
translation.fr: Tumi, si tu étais arrivée plus tôt,

translation.en: we wouldn't have to squeeze everything into one day
translation.fr: on aurait eu le temps et on serait pas à la bourre.

translation.en: - and maybe we wouldn't be behind schedule. - Chill, okay.
translation.fr: on aurait eu le temps et on serait pas à la bourre. T'excite pas.

translation.en: I'm sure Refiloe and Thando have things sorted at the venue.
translation.fr: Refiloe et Thando vont assurer tout le long.

translation.en: Tumi, you're the maid of honor.
Yeah.
You look nice.
You mean amazing. Thank you.
Baby, how long do you think we're going to take here?
translation.fr: On en a encore pour longtemps ?

translation.en: Poor Khaya. He's probably bored in the car.
translation.fr: Khaya doit en avoir marre d'attendre.

translation.en: - What's going on there? - Where?
You and Khaya.
Oh, come on. Are you guys done ignoring each other?
translation.fr: - Vous ne vous ignorez plus ? - On s'ignorait pas.

translation.en: We weren’t. We were. It’s been awkward for two years now.
translation.fr: Si. C'est pas net depuis deux ans.

translation.en: I hope you know you’re not getting any younger.
- I would rather die happy. - You can’t be alone and happy.
translation.fr: - Je veux mourir heureuse. - Seule ? Impossible.

translation.en: How do you know? It's not like your family is the poster for happy endings in relationships.
translation.fr: Qu'en sais-tu ? La famille ne brille pas, côté couples heureux pour la vie.

translation.en: For real, listen.
Aunt Moipone's husband died when she was young.
translation.fr: Tata Moipone a perdu son mari très tôt.

translation.en: Grace got dumped shortly after her bride price was agreed.
Your uncle is married to alcohol.
translation.fr: Tonton est marié à la bouteille.

translation.en: I don't even want to talk about your mother.
translation.fr: Je parle même pas de maman.

translation.en: - You know, I’m pretty sure we’re cursed. - Don’t say that.
translation.fr: - La famille maudite. - Dis pas ça.

translation.en: Why? No, no, no, we are actually better off alone.
translation.fr: Pourquoi ? On n'est pas mieux toutes seules ?

translation.en: What if Mom didn't want to be alone?
translation.fr: Et si maman voulait pas être seule ?

translation.en: Dad made that decision for her.
translation.fr: Papa a décidé à sa place.

translation.en: Yeah.
What if he made a mistake?
Guys, can you give us a second?
Tight.
Whose address is this?
It's Dad's.
I asked Aunt Grace to help me find him.
translation.fr: Tata Grace m'a aidée à le retrouver.

translation.en: Just don’t tell Mom.
Come on, say something.
- Why now? - Because what kind of bride doesn’t have a father to walk her down the aisle?
translation.fr: - Maintenant ? - Un père conduit la mariée à l'autel.

translation.en: He left you before you took your first steps.
translation.fr: Tu ne marchais pas quand il est parti.

translation.en: - Okay, don’t you want to see him? - No! But actually, I...
translation.fr: Mais tu ne veux pas le revoir ? Non ! C'est un...

translation.en: I don’t care about people who abandon me.
translation.fr: Ceux qui m'abandonnent ne m'intéressent pas.

translation.en: Mom left me with Granny,
and you’ve seen what it’s like between me and her.
translation.fr: Tu as vu où on en est.

translation.en: Yeah.
It just feels like something's missing.
You’re about to cement yourself as Mommy's favorite daughter
translation.fr: Tu es partie pour devenir la fille préférée de maman.

translation.en: and then marry the Black Prince Harry,
translation.fr: Tu épouses le prince Harry noir

translation.en: and I'm gonna say something nice about you publicly at your reception.
translation.fr: et je vais dire des trucs bien sur toi, en public, à ton mariage.

translation.en: Do you really need more than that?
Wow, Beauty. I'm good, I'm done.
translation.fr: Beauty, c'est bon, je m'arrête là.

translation.en: I can't.
Look, I can take you to Mauritius,
translation.fr: Je peux t'emmener à l'île Maurice.

translation.en: but in return you're gonna have to be my personal insta photographer.
translation.fr: En échange, tu seras ma photographe insta personnelle.

translation.en: Beauty is living in a fairytale,
translation.fr: Beauty vit dans un conte de fées.

translation.en: or doesn’t think.
I have an idea.
We can maybe meet up later, I'll cook you dinner,
translation.fr: On se retrouve plus tard, je vais cuisiner

translation.en: and you can use your sommelier skills to upgrade my wine collection.
translation.fr: et avec ton savoir-faire de sommelier, tu amélioreras ma cave.

translation.en: That sounds great, right?
And we can talk about whatever’s going on between you and your sister.
translation.fr: Et on parle de ce qui se passe entre ta sœur et toi.

translation.en: I don’t want to talk.
Then I’ll help you with your speech.
translation.fr: Alors, je t'aiderai avec ton speech.

translation.en: Look,
I’m glad that you called me.
translation.fr: je suis content que tu aies appelé.

translation.en: And that things aren’t awkward between us after…
translation.fr: Et qu'on ne soit plus aussi coincés tous les deux, après...

translation.en: everything that happened.
A free dinner sounds good. Yeah!
But you have to pay me to help you with your wine collection.
translation.fr: Mais pour ta cave, faudra me payer.

translation.en: Oh, of course.
I’ll call you when I’m done.
Also, if you're gonna take me to Mauritius,
translation.fr: En plus, si tu m'emmènes à l'île Maurice,

translation.en: you're gonna have to pack a selfie stick.
translation.fr: n'oublie pas une canne à selfie.

translation.en: - What? - They want me to put up the tent.
translation.fr: - Quoi ? - Je dois monter la tente.

translation.en: You’re an engineering student. Look at God!
translation.fr: Tu fais des études d'ingénieur. Tourne-toi vers Dieu !

translation.en: I hope you're not taking the Lord's name in vain, Boitumelo?
translation.fr: J'espère que tu n'invoques pas le Seigneur en vain.

translation.en: Just praising Him because He’s so good. Hallelujah.
translation.fr: Je Le loue, Il est si bon ! Alléluia !

translation.en: Ah, Boitumelo Sello!
Did you bring me nice alcohol from Cape Town?
translation.fr: Tu m'as apporté une liqueur du Cap ?

translation.en: Hello, how are you?
How are you? I'm fine.
I'm kidding. You know, you know I’ve got your back.
translation.fr: Je plaisante ! Tu sais bien que je te couvre.

translation.en: My uncle can drink anyone under the table and still be a fully functioning adult.
translation.fr: Mon oncle boit comme un trou, mais sans perdre ses moyens.

translation.en: All of you, I don't want you drinking.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas que vous buviez.

translation.en: We need to concentrate and be focused.
translation.fr: Il faut qu'on reste concentrés et vigilants.

translation.en: Then you wonder why - she doesn't come home. - Amen.
translation.fr: - Pas étonnant qu'elle vienne jamais ! - Amen.

translation.en: You too, Grace.
We need to prepare for tomorrow's gifting ceremony.
translation.fr: Il faut préparer la cérémonie de remise des cadeaux de demain.

translation.en: Bokang. Why are you just standing there?
translation.fr: Bokang, pourquoi tu es planté là ?

translation.en: - Tumi. - Ma.
Where are the towels?
Oh, the towel sets for the gift giving ceremony tomorrow.
translation.fr: Oui ! Les serviettes pour la cérémonie de remise des cadeaux !

translation.en: At least they would have been if I had remembered to buy them.
translation.fr: Enfin, il y en aurait si je m'étais rappelé d'en acheter.

translation.en: Think it's best I bring them in the morning.  Just before the Twalas arrive.
translation.fr: C'est mieux si je les apporte demain, juste avant l'arrivée des Twala.

translation.en: I want everything packed tonight!
translation.fr: Je veux que tout soit prêt et plié ce soir !

translation.en: I don't want Dineo saying I'm sabotaging her child's wedding.
translation.fr: Je veux que tout soit prêt et plié ce soir ! Que Dineo ne dise pas que je sabote le mariage de sa fille.

translation.en: - All right, let me-- - She's right.
translation.fr: - Bon, je vais... - Elle a raison.

translation.en: Shadrack.
Make sure you fetch the meat.
Don't worry yourself, Dini. I will bring back the best meat.
translation.fr: Ne t'en fais pas, Dini. J'apporterai ce qu'il y a de mieux.

translation.en: Succulent! Top class.
translation.fr: Une viande succulente ! Le top du top.

translation.en: With this rope.
An electric one?
And you Grace, you're cooking with me at the venue.
translation.fr: Grace, tu vas cuisiner avec moi.

translation.en: No, what's the point of doing it at a venue then?
translation.fr: Non ! Pourquoi cuisiner pour la réception ?

translation.en: It means there's already catering.
There's no need for us to cook.
Grace, the Twala's paid for everything,
translation.fr: Grace, ce sont les Twala qui paient tout.

translation.en: but they can't pay for good food.
translation.fr: Mais ce ne sera pas de la bonne cuisine.

translation.en: Also, Grace makes the best potato salad.
translation.fr: La salade de pommes de terre de Grace est unique.

translation.en: That's the only thing she can make.
translation.fr: - C'est tout ce qu'elle sait faire. - Pitié !

translation.en: - Oh, my goodness. - Listen here.
translation.fr: - C'est tout ce qu'elle sait faire. - Pitié ! Écoutez bien.

translation.en: I don't want any mistakes for the next three days. No mistakes.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas de gaffes pendant trois jours. Ni gaffes, ni drames. Tu entends, Shadrack ?

translation.en: No drama. Do you hear me, Shadrack?
translation.fr: Ni gaffes, ni drames. Tu entends, Shadrack ?

translation.en: Yes.
We're not you or your children, Dineo.
translation.fr: - On n'est ni toi, ni tes enfants. - Moipone !

translation.en: Sister Moipone. What did you say about my kids?
translation.fr: - On n'est ni toi, ni tes enfants. - Moipone ! Qu'est-ce que tu as dit sur mes enfants ?

translation.en: Please don't start with me.
translation.fr: S'il te plaît, ne commence pas !

translation.en: - I'm asking you. - Wait a minute.
translation.fr: - Je te demande un peu ! - Attendez.

translation.en: Let's go.
You must lock up Sister Moipone.
translation.fr: Ferme. La clé est sur la table.

translation.en: The key is on the table. - Okay, I'm coming. - Hurry up!
Mama won’t get it.
Who cares? Just come out to her.
translation.fr: C'est ta vie, fais ton coming-out.

translation.en: I'm not like you.
My mum actually likes me.
And Terrence? Is he going to actually like you,  once I phone him and uninvite him?
translation.fr: Et Terrence, il va t'aimer quand je vais annuler son invitation ?

translation.en: Let's get a move on.
Your mum can't find us here.
translation.fr: Ta mère doit pas nous trouver ici.

translation.en: - Don't forget, we have a deal. - Okay.
I'll help you with the towels, and you call Terrence and tell him that he can't come to the wedding.
translation.fr: Je t'aide pour les serviettes et tu dis à Terrence qu'il peut pas venir.

translation.en: Why did you invite him in the first place?
I didn't invite him!
He assumed he is invited.
translation.fr: Pour lui, c'était clair qu'il l'était.

translation.en: Wait, you got a plus one? Okay.
Okay, you must distract her,
translation.fr: Tu vas la distraire et je prends les serviettes.

translation.en: - and I'll get the towels. Go in! -
Hi.
- Oh, Precious. Baby girl! - What's going on?
translation.fr: - Ma jolie ! Ma toute belle. - Que se passe-t-il ?

translation.en: Baby girl. So you know there’s a wedding, right?
translation.fr: Baby, tu sais qu'il y a un mariage ce soir ?

translation.en: But Grace, why are you chopping such big pieces?
translation.fr: Grace ! Pourquoi tu coupes de gros morceaux ?

translation.en: This is the size you said you wanted.  I didn't say that.
translation.fr: - C'est ce que tu m'as dit de faire. - Pas du tout.

translation.en: Then you come and chop them.
This is why men leave you.
translation.fr: Voilà pourquoi les hommes te quittent.

translation.en: Oh! Where's your ring then?
translation.fr: Hé ! Et elle est où, ton alliance ?

translation.en: Me? At least I had a ring on my finger before.
translation.fr: Au moins, j'en ai porté une un jour.

translation.en: You on the other hand…
Mrs. Sello, as we discussed, you are welcome to cook here,
translation.fr: Mme Sello, je vous l'ai dit, vous pouvez cuisiner ici,

translation.en: even though we do have a Michelin star chef.
translation.fr: même si nous avons un chef primé par le Michelin.

translation.en: Can he make my mother’s mutton curry?
translation.fr: Sait-il faire le curry de ma mère ?

translation.en: - Well, no, but-- - Then that's not good enough.
translation.fr: - Non, mais... - Il n'est pas si bien.

translation.en: It’s just that we have an aesthetic here.
translation.fr: C'est que nous tenons à une certaine esthétique,

translation.en: And that aesthetic does not include three- legged pots sitting outside
translation.fr: laquelle ne comprend pas trois marmites dehors,

translation.en: for everyone to see.
translation.fr: sous les yeux de tout le monde.

translation.en: Your aesthetic doesn’t accommodate Black people?
translation.fr: Une esthétique peu adaptée aux Noirs ?

translation.en: Yes!
I mean...
No! I mean…
You know what?
The pots are fine. I love them.
translation.fr: pas de souci pour les marmites. J'adore !

translation.en: So authentic!
Happy, happy cooking.
Oh, God.
I forget that you can be a boss sometimes.
translation.fr: Des fois, j'oublie que t'es la patronne.

translation.en: A Sello boss.
Please go back to work, the fun is over.
translation.fr: Au travail, la rigolade est finie.

translation.en: - Sisters! Sisters! -
The meat has arrived.
- Shadrack. - Oh, my goodness, Shadrack!
- It's alive! - Don't worry, Dini.
translation.fr: - Il est vivant ! - T'en fais pas, Dini.

translation.en: I will slaughter it nicely.
Plus your mutton curry will be so tender.
translation.fr: Et ton curry de mouton sera tendre.

translation.en: It's an orphan. I got it for a discount.
translation.fr: C'est un orphelin, je l'ai eu au rabais.

translation.en: - Where's my change? - I had to get a truck.
translation.fr: - Et ma monnaie ? - J'ai loué une camionnette.

translation.en: What about your crappy car?
I didn't want to traumatize it. It's an orphan.  With that piece of junk.
translation.fr: Je voulais pas le traumatiser. Un orphelin dans ce vieux clou ?

translation.en: Did you spend my money on alcohol?
- Let me smell your breath. -
Again.
I think she said the kitchen is this way.
translation.fr: Elle a dit que la cuisine était par là.

translation.en: - Kelebogile, come here. -
Hello, Valencia.
- This is Grace. - Yeah, Grace.
It looks like you need help in here.
Yes, you can help chop over there.
translation.fr: Il y a les légumes à couper.

translation.en: Dineo doesn’t need our help with preparing tomorrow’s lunch.
translation.fr: Dineo n'a pas besoin de nous pour préparer le déjeuner.

translation.en: - Isn't that right, Dineo? - My team is ready.
translation.fr: Pas vrai ? Eh bien, mon équipe est prête.

translation.en: Good for you.
You know having a personal chef has made me so lazy.
translation.fr: Avec un grand chef à ma disposition, je suis devenue paresseuse.

translation.en: Nice life problems.
Oh, well.
What was that?
Family choir.
We'll leave you ladies to it.
translation.fr: Nous vous laissons à vos affaires.

translation.en: See you tomorrow, Valencia.
Get that sheep out and make sure no one sees you, Shadrack.
translation.fr: Fais sortir ce mouton sans te faire voir, Shadrack !

translation.en: - Come help me, Grace. - I'll come help you, Brother.
Where are you going? You're not done cooking.
translation.fr: Où tu vas ? Tu n'as pas fini ici.

translation.en: Grace, let's go!
My pots are burning.
- Shadrack! - Grace!
Hallelujah! We're about to die of hunger.
translation.fr: Alléluia ! On allait mourir de faim.

translation.en: - Themba. - Okay.
Thank you, my boy.
Sbu, how did your wedding prep issues go?
What wedding prep issues?
She's talking about
the one- on- one. The brotherly mentorship thing.
translation.fr: de notre tête à tête fraternel, où j'ai joué au mentor.

translation.en: Themba, you know that my ovulation window is small.
I'm sorry.
It’s these hormone injections that I'm taking.
translation.fr: C'est à cause des injections d'hormones.

translation.en: Injections?
Yes, Grandma, so that she can fall pregnant.
Why don't you just screw? That's the way to get pregnant.
translation.fr: Baisez, non ? On tombe enceinte comme ça.

translation.en: Grandma, it's actually a long story.
Here’s to giving South Africa
translation.fr: Offrons donc à l'Afrique du Sud...

translation.en: an extravaganza that will trend for hours.
translation.fr: un grand spectacle dont on parlera des heures !

translation.en: I don't know why I agreed to a camera crew.
translation.fr: Pourquoi j'ai accepté que nous soyons filmés ?

translation.en: Can’t it just be interviews?
Sbu, I didn’t pay all this money to book out The Four Seasons,
translation.fr: Sbu, je n'ai pas dépensé une fortune en réservant le Four Seasons

translation.en: just so we could do more interviews.
Could you learn to just be a little grateful, my child?
I mean, you sprung this on us so fast, Sbusiso.
translation.fr: Ce mariage nous est tombé dessus si vite, Sbusiso.

translation.en: I understand. It's just that I didn't want you guys to turn this into a political party conference.
translation.fr: Je comprends, mais je ne voulais pas en faire un congrès politique.

translation.en: You see I just wanted something small. Nothing major.
translation.fr: Je voulais un mariage tout simple.

translation.en: Sbusiso.
Look at Themba and Lydia. They had a big wedding
translation.fr: regarde Themba et Lydia, ils ont eu un grand mariage.

translation.en: and look how happy they are.
But they are not screwing.
Aunt, here you go. The towel sets are ready
translation.fr: Et voilà, Tata. Les serviettes sont prêtes.

translation.en: for the Twala Aunties.
Ah, good girl!
Why did you bring them all the way here from the house?
translation.fr: Mais pourquoi tu les as apportées jusqu'ici ?

translation.en: If this girl winds up dead, just know I did it.
translation.fr: Si elle meurt dans une seconde, ça viendra de moi.

translation.en: I've said this before,
I don’t want to be blamed for sabotaging
translation.fr: je veux pas qu'on m'accuse d'avoir saboté

translation.en: my sister's wedding.
- Just give them to me and I'll put them-- - No, it's okay. I've got them.
translation.fr: Si tu me les donnais pour... C'est bon, je m'en charge !

translation.en: Give them to Thando. She knows where to put them.
translation.fr: Donne-les à Thando. Elle sait où les mettre.

translation.en: Babe, sorry. Did you get these from the hotel?
translation.fr: Ma chérie, pardon... est-ce qu'elles viennent de l'hôtel ?

translation.en: In retrospect, this was a geniously bad idea.
translation.fr: Finalement, c'était une idée génialement mauvaise.

translation.en: No.
No, but this is the hotel’s monogram.
translation.fr: C'est le monogramme de l'hôtel, ça.

translation.en: No, friend, maybe,
maybe the venue buys the towels from the same shop as her. Duh!
translation.fr: l'hôtel se fournit peut-être dans la même boutique qu'elle.

translation.en: Dear sweet Refiloe.
You were going to give my in- laws stolen towels from the hotel they paid for?
translation.fr: Tu allais donner à ma belle-famille les serviettes de l'hôtel qu'ils paient ?

translation.en: Bokang, do you also steal now?
She did this all on her own.
translation.fr: Elle a tout fait toute seule.

translation.en: No, I was going to go buy towels in the morning.
translation.fr: Non, je pensais acheter des serviettes demain matin.

translation.en: These are just, you know, for now.
Do you know what?
translation.fr: Je vais vous dire, j'ai une amie qui peut nous aider

translation.en: I have a friend who can help us by opening her shop early.
translation.fr: Je vais vous dire, j'ai une amie qui peut nous aider en ouvrant sa boutique tôt.

translation.en: - She sells this type of stuff-- - Relax, okay?
- They’re just towels. - Yep.
These towels are for the welcoming ceremony.
translation.fr: Ces serviettes servent à la cérémonie de bienvenue.

translation.en: At least I’m catching heat from my aunt and not my mother.
translation.fr: Au moins, je me fais houspiller par ma tante, pas par ma mère.

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
Maybe you should hear this from your mother.
translation.fr: C'est à ta mère de le dire.

translation.en: Mama…
do you see this sheep?
I gave it a name.
translation.fr: Je lui ai donné un nom.

translation.en: Her name is succulent.
Dineo is crazy. We are going to eat it.
translation.fr: Dineo est folle. On va le manger.

translation.en: Yes, we are going to eat it.
She'll tell everybody it's the best mutton curry she's ever made.
translation.fr: Et elle va dire à tout le monde que c'est le meilleur mouton qu'elle ait jamais fait.

translation.en: - You know her. - She's ridiculous.
translation.fr: - Tu la connais bien. - Elle est ridicule !

translation.en: She and her sister, Moipone, are in the same WhatsApp group.
translation.fr: Elle et Moipone font partie du même groupe WhatsApp.

translation.en: They talk too much.
Yes, all the time you just hear her shouting Grace!
translation.fr: Elle est tout le temps en train de crier : Grace !

translation.en: Shadrack!
Grace! Shadrack!
Emergency!
You're all overreacting.
These are just towels!
translation.fr: Vous exagérez vraiment ! - Des serviettes ! - Boitumelo !

translation.en: Boitumelo, you like to provoke people.
So the emergency is about towels?
With respect, I could list all your faults,
translation.fr: Si tu permets, je pourrais énumérer tous tes torts.

translation.en: but we would be here for a while.
translation.fr: Mais ça prendrait un bout de temps.

translation.en: Don't talk to me like that.
translation.fr: Ne me parle pas sur ce ton.

translation.en: What else must I do?
Tumi, my in- laws are going to hear you.
That’s all you care about?
Yes, this is my wedding.
I don’t need this. You know, if I’m such a problem,
translation.fr: C'est trop. Si je pose tant de problèmes, faites ce mariage sans moi.

translation.en: - then have this wedding without me. - Ohh my goodness!
translation.fr: Si je pose tant de problèmes, faites ce mariage sans moi. Seigneur !

translation.en: - Tumi. -
What's really going on?
So, seriously, the emergency was the towels?
Sorry, Ma.
I hope you’re not on your way to see Sbusiso. It’s bad luck.
translation.fr: Tu ne vas pas voir Sbusiso, j'espère. Ça porte malheur.

translation.en: No… no, um…
the decorations…
You know, Mom, I'm so happy to be marrying Sbu.
translation.fr: Je suis tellement heureuse d'épouser Sbu.

translation.en: Of course. You’ll never have to work again.
translation.fr: Évidemment, tu n'auras plus à travailler.

translation.en: Oh, I wasn’t talking about money.
Don’t pretend. It's just the two of us here.
translation.fr: Ne fais pas semblant, on est entre nous.

translation.en: Go to bed, Beauty.
You don’t want those dark circles around your eyes tomorrow in your pictures, right?
translation.fr: Il ne faut pas qu'on voie tes cernes sur les photos, demain.

translation.en: You'll look ugly.
- Hi. - It's bad luck.
Okay, okay. What's wrong?
- Everyone’s ruining my wedding. - You want me to go deal with them?
translation.fr: Ils gâchent tous mon mariage ! - Tu veux que je m'en occupe ? - Oui.

translation.en: - Yeah. - Yeah?
translation.fr: - Tu veux que je m'en occupe ? - Oui.

translation.en: No.
It'll just make things worse.
- Let’s just go sign at Home Affairs. - No.
I’m not cancelling my dream wedding just because you’re cheap.
translation.fr: J'annule pas mon mariage de rêve parce que t'es radin.

translation.en: Cheap? Cheap?
- It's bad luck. - Okay, okay.
Do you know how much a London flat costs?
translation.fr: Tu as une idée du prix des apparts à Londres ?

translation.en: And only God knows why you selected a two bedroom.
translation.fr: En plus, tu as demandé deux chambres !

translation.en: It's for our future babies.
Yeah, but we’re far away from that. I mean, thank God, right?
translation.fr: On n'en est pas encore là, Dieu merci.

translation.en: - What? - Nothing.
Can I get married without my mother and sister fighting?
translation.fr: Mais je ne peux pas me marier sans que ma mère et ma sœur se disputent ?

translation.en: - Do you want us to wait for them to stop? - No.
The next available date for this venue is in 2022
translation.fr: La prochaine date possible est en 2022.

translation.en: and that’s not enough time for those two.
translation.fr: C'est trop court pour ces deux-là.

translation.en: Well,
I think I know how to make you feel better.
translation.fr: je sais comment te remonter le moral.

translation.en: - Come here. Come here. -
- Not until after the wedding. - Shh.
No, baby. It's bad luck.
You sound like my mom.
- Nope. - I’m joking! I'm joking, it was a joke.
translation.fr: - Non ! - Je rigole. C'était une vanne !

translation.en: Hey.
Hey.
What's up?
Where's your wife?
The wife is sleeping.
She's fast asleep.
I'm just feeling a bit restless,  you know. And you?
translation.fr: Moi, je suis un peu nerveux. Et toi ?

translation.en: I quit the wedding.
What?
translation.fr: Quoi ? Je savais pas qu'on pouvait.

translation.en: - I didn’t know you could do that. - I'm the queen of the game.
translation.fr: Quoi ? Je savais pas qu'on pouvait. Je suis la reine de la partie. Je leur ai même fauché du vin.

translation.en: Look, I even stole their wine.
translation.fr: Je suis la reine de la partie. Je leur ai même fauché du vin.

translation.en: No, thank you.
Good choice.
This stuff tastes like pee.
Let me have a look.
I know this wine. This wine's supposed to be really good,
translation.fr: Je connais ce vin. Il est très réputé.

translation.en: but you're the expert.
Reputation doesn’t mean good taste.
translation.fr: Ça veut pas dire qu'il est bon.

translation.en: You should take in the nose of the wine.
translation.fr: Le vin, il faut le sentir.

translation.en: Tell me, what do you smell?
Alcohol?
- Oh! Zulu boys. - Whatever.
translation.fr: - Oh ! Le bon garçon zoulou ! - Ouais, ouais.

translation.en: You should be able to scent it’s spices, you know,
and the wood from where the barrel's from.
See, the scent of a wine can tell you its life story.
translation.fr: Tu vois, l'arôme du vin raconte son histoire.

translation.en: But in your case, this one is free. So, have some.
translation.fr: Mais là, on a du vin à l'œil. Profitons-en.

translation.en: No, I'm fine. Thank you.
Oh, come on! It's one drink, it's not going to hurt you.
translation.fr: Allez ! Un verre va pas te faire de mal.

translation.en: I want to be clear- headed for tomorrow, I want to be focused.
translation.fr: Je veux avoir l'esprit clair, demain. Rester concentré.

translation.en: - And so should you. - No, no, no!
See, I'm fine right here in wine land.
See, here I don’t feel so alone
and I'm not judged for every mistake that I make.
translation.fr: On me reproche plus mes moindres gaffes.

translation.en: Sounds nice.
Yeah, it is. Just…
one night of being free.
And wine doesn't judge.
Take it.
- Take it. - You're annoying.
Okay.
Not to bad.
Wait, walk properly.
- I am walking properly. -
♪ You're gonna burn out ♪
♪ All my love ♪
- I feel so alive, man. - Yup.
I could do anything.
- I can do anything! - Themba, you're the man!
♪ I've been watching you ♪
Okay.
Let’s go swimming!
- Do you even know how to swim? - No!
Hey, where you at?
I thought we had plans.
translation.fr: Je croyais qu'on devait se voir.

translation.en: I guess Beauty must be working you really hard, huh?
Call me when you get this.
translation.fr: Rappelle dès que tu as eu mon message.

translation.en: ♪ They've taken my wife ♪
I’m sure Themba’s fine and there’s no need for this hullabaloo.
translation.fr: Je suis sûr que Themba va bien, inutile de s'affoler.

translation.en: He’s still not answering his phone.
- He must be somewhere around here. - I’m going to look for him.
translation.fr: Il ne doit pas être loin. Je vais le chercher.

translation.en: Oh, no.
I'm not going to allow that child's paranoia to annoy our guests.
translation.fr: La paranoïa de cette petite ne va pas troubler nos invités.

translation.en: - Sbu. - Yes.
Which one do you think is gonna work better for the camera?
translation.fr: Quelle cravate passera le mieux à la télé ?

translation.en: Hello, may I please ask
- has anyone seen my husband around? - Any problem?
translation.fr: - Avez-vous vu mon mari ? - Un problème ?

translation.en: No. No problem.
What's going on?
Let me go and check.
Go, finish up. I'm just happy that this drama doesn't involve us
translation.fr: Non ! Au boulot. Heureusement, ça nous regarde pas.

translation.en: and Shadrack got rid of the sheep.
- About that… - Uh- huh.
You and Shadrack.  Sister.
Don't leave me.
He wanted to slaughter it, but he was too drunk. I took him home,
translation.fr: Il voulait l'abattre. Mais il était ivre, je l'ai ramené à la maison.

translation.en: but I couldn't load the sheep into the van on my own.
translation.fr: Mais je pouvais pas porter aussi le mouton.

translation.en: The two of you had one job and you failed.
translation.fr: Vous n'aviez que ça à faire et vous l'avez loupé.

translation.en: - Oh, my goodness. - So where's the sheep?
It was tied here, Sister.
- Do you see a sheep here? - Oh, my goodness, Sister.
translation.fr: - Tu le vois, toi ? - Ma sœur !

translation.en: You see Candice and the Twalas.  They can't find it before we do.
translation.fr: Tu as vu Candice et les Twala. Faut le trouver avant eux.

translation.en: There's the Twala family.
Let's go.
- Are you still looking for Themba? - Unfortunately so.
translation.fr: - Vous cherchez toujours Themba ? - Eh, oui.

translation.en: - Lydia, try calling him again. - Okay.
Tumi? Why do you have Themba’s phone?
translation.fr: Tumi, tu as le téléphone de Thumba ?

translation.en: Oh, fuck.
- It's just, um… -
- Tumi! - Where is my husband?
Why are his underpants floating in the pool?
That’s not what it looks like. Um…
translation.fr: C'est pas ce que vous croyez.

translation.en: Was he drinking?
A shit load. A little.
- We have to call the police. - No, no, no.
Boitumelo, what were you doing?
- What did you do? - We're not calling the police.
What if those media vultures find out? No police.
- She's starting again. - Wait a minute. What's the fuss all about?
translation.fr: Elle remet ça ! Dites donc ! C'est quoi, le problème ?

translation.en: Themba’s a recovering alcoholic.
That explains a lot.
Yes and the last time Themba drank,
translation.fr: Et la dernière fois qu'il a bu,

translation.en: he ended up in Mozambique without a passport.
translation.fr: il a fini au Mozambique sans papiers.

translation.en: He caused me a diplomatic incident of note and tainted my image.
translation.fr: Il m'a causé un incident diplomatique. Mon image en a pâti.

translation.en: We’ll find him before he gets to Mozambique.
translation.fr: On le trouvera avant qu'il file aussi loin.

translation.en: Look. What's this?
What is this?
I'm going to kill you!
- No, no, no. - No, wait! Wait!
Get out of my way.
- This wedding is off. - Huh- uh, Mum--
- Peasant! - Val… Valencia.
Tumi, what’s going on?
I told you it wasn’t what it looked like.
translation.fr: Oui, c'est pas ce qu'on croit.

translation.en: Tumi!
- It's worse. -
Subtitle translated by: Rolé Swiegers
